reviews.title: Great purchase for our teenager
reviews.review_text: Purchased for our 15 year old son's birthday - over one month of use and can honestly say it was a fantastic buy! It's the perfect size for his room without being too bulky. You can fit several drinks snacks inside. 10/10 recommend for size, price quality

reviews.title: Perfect size and works great
reviews.review_text: This may sound silly, but trying to find a mini fridge without bold company logos on the front is difficult because some are really tacky and that bothers me. I wanted a small black fridge with a gold handle. I bought this one, and purchased a gold handle with an adhesive backing that arrives tomorrow. This should have a “clean but custom” look. The dimensions are perfect for one person. I cut out a shelf in my loft to set this at the right height. The bottom part back is intended to be open. I see complaints from these small fridges that they are missing the “back.” The back is intended to face the wall and gives the compressor breathing room. Hard to tell from the photos but there is 19 inches behind the fridge. The item arrived with zero dents and cooled down completely the same night. I don't hear it at all, so I would say it's very quiet. The space is perfect for late-night snacks and any “go-to” items without having to go downstairs. The only thing that could be better is the energy efficiency. This is rated a (2) so it will cost more to run annually than a higher rating. All in all, I love the fridge, and it was a good purchase

reviews.title: Unbalanced/tips over a little when door opens
reviews.review_text: I just plugged it in today and so far it is working fine and getting cold. The mini freezer compartment seems to get very cold as well (my little thermometer in the picture I brought in from outside to test it says about 20° F). Started getting cold almost immediately after plugging it in. So so far I'm satisfied with how cold it's getting which is why I bought it because I had just bought a smaller “personal chiller” from a different brand that did not get cold enough so I had to take that one back. The only issue I'm having with it which was present before plugging in is that it is unbalanced so it tips over a little whenever I open it. It seems that one of the 4 feet/legs on the bottom 4 corners of the fridge must be slightly shorter than the others. It is annoying but so far not causing too much issue. It's also not too loud in my opinion. It does make noise but it is not constant. It gets a little louder after it's been open for a minute and probably the compressor/machine or something needs to work to keep it cool (idk how fridges work lol) so that is the loudest part but again, that specific noise is not constant. I think it does make some noise though. If the Walmart website lets me I will update if anything changes but so far so good after only a day.

reviews.title: Nice fridge… but …
reviews.review_text: So this mini fridge is exactly what I needed …. except the door opens to the wrong side. Ok no problem, it says it can be easily moved to the other side. Good let's do that…. Except the holes don't line up properly. For starters the holes on the other side were filled with foam, and the foam sprayed out, so I had to scrape it away to find said holes. Then after moving all the hardware over, the top holes are drilled a tad too close to the front. This causes the door to not close tightly. I had to put everything back to the other side. Other than that it functions as it should.

The refrigerator was what it was advertised to be. it is a small refrigerator that will cool some beverages and small items. it's excellent for space conscious places. The compressor is not very large ,so it takes a little bit of time to cool . When it gets cool , it works very well.

reviews.title: Works great - just be sure you check for damage!
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, our refrigerator had a pretty big full size dent on the front. The carton was damaged so it should not have been sold at full price. Unfortunately, the reason we bought it was that our full sized frig quit working and we needed it until our part came in or I would have returned it. It works great and saved the day otherwise!

reviews.title: MOLD IN A “BRAND NEW FRIDGE?????
reviews.review_text: I bout this mini fridge for my room and when I opened it to set it up there was literally MOLD all over the interior of the item. Mind you I thought this would've been a brand new mini fridge due it not tell you it was used. I don't have a vehicle and now I have to wait for the item to be shipped back to Walmart for them to assess the item just for me to get my money back.

reviews.title: I wish I had waited for the one I wanted
reviews.review_text: I ordered a great 2- door silver fridge. This is the one I ended up with on my fiancés birthday. As his gift for his outdoor shop. We didn't need the tiny freezer in this one. It and the parts that run it in the back/bottom are too bulky, taking up valuable space. I at least wanted a 3 cu ft with separate freezer (this one frosts and can't turn it off) or one a little larger than this one with no freezer. I picked WITHOUT FREEZER in my searches but they always showed the ones with freezers first. If I had seen it in the store I wouldn't have bought it. But the others seem always to be out of stock. Online shopping said there WAS the one I wanted at the store but shoppers said it wasn't there.

haven't been plugged in for 24 hours the temperature equalize that 43.6.f totally unacceptable. I should have known better than to buy this brand I bought one two and a half years ago and it died last week no warranty was. but I like the refrigerator size so I bought another one and it doesn't cool down enough to keep food fresh.

reviews.title: Walmart sucks
reviews.review_text: I like this product I bought two other items that don't work. !800 WALMART is ALWAYS busy. I regret having bought the Walmart . Walmart doesn't take exchanges. Thank goodness for Amazon. I dare you to post this. I bought a fire extinguisher which was broken during shipping and Walmart refuses to exchange it. Close to the same time I bought a Bristol free grill brush that spins which doesn't come apart to clean . I have called 1800walmart NUMEROUS TIMES and is always busy no matter the time tried. I called the store manager and she told me I would be wasting my time bring it there because she is not allowed to replace on-line items.

It's the perfect size for n office or bedroom. I was looking for something I can keep a few items cold in my rented bedroom and thus fridge is perfect. It's quite, doesn't take up that much room and even looks good on the shelf. I can load it up with mt waterloo and leftovers, and it keeps everything nice and cold. I actually had to turn the settings down as it was freezing the waterloo.

It's great fridge but when I opened it the corner was bent and damaged. I had no time to return it to get a new one so now it sits in my classroom damaged in corner with a big dent but it works well. I love the slick design and cools great just didn't like that it was dropped damaged and the company still packed it like that.

reviews.title: love it
reviews.review_text: i got this after i came back to work from maternity leave and keep this under my desk to store breast milk and pump. It's super quiet has a little freezer that holds up to 8 4 to 5oz bags could possible store more it has made pumping at work so much easier im so glad i bought it

There is little room inside. The bottom shelf cannot hold more than a few protein drinks. The top shelf has a plate for catching water from small freezer. I like it but that leaves half a shelf for a Tupperware with my lunch. The freezer is small and I use it to hold small reusable ice bags for students who need an ice pack. It could probably hold 1 frozen meal. The big reason for the 3 rating is mine arrived banged up in a box that had gouges. When I reached out, they asked me to repackage and ship back. It was already in my classroom and custodian had taken box away. I had taken pictures to show the box damaged. I would have been happy to return to Walmart but shipping back is too much to ask. It didn't affect performance but it's ugly because of the dents.

reviews.title: Don't purchase
reviews.review_text: This refrigerator arrived damaged I plugged in up and it doesn't even turn on. Now I have to return in store for refund
it came damaged on the outside. used Walmart delivery. had to keep it because i needed it for my husband's medicine. might ask the delivery people to be a little more careful when picking products.

reviews.title: Hisense mini fridge
reviews.review_text: I bought this Black Hisense 1.6 cubic foot single door mini fridge for my husband for out in his garage. He really likes it! When he plugged it in it got cold really fast. It's perfect for what he needs. Just room enough for a few bottles of pop, water, and beer. The black finish is great for a dusty garage. I chose Hisense brand because of the value price; and we have had two flat screen Hisense TV's that we have had for several years and they still work great. Good quality products.

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Our LG refrigerator compressor failed after only 18 months. This unit really helped keep our essentials cold until the compressor is replaced. We will continue to use this little unit for our liquids and some essentials. The temperature is true and the access is easy. I would recommend this for anyone who needs a little refrigerator.

Never got it! Ordered it, tracked it for days. Finally I got to see the complete "CLOSED" picture of supposed delivery. It was a tiny box of something. Not delivered to me! I chatted will Walmart. I got the most hateful nasties person I have ever spoken with at Walmart. She gave me NO CHOICE but to request a REFUND. She was terrible! No help at all!

reviews.title: Great Mini-Fridge!
reviews.review_text: This mini-fridge has more room than I had anticipated. I love that I can store apx. 6 Uncrustables in the freezer compartment! The fridge keeps my drinks nice and cold, my dip and cottage cheese, eggsalad, etc. just right. My only regret is not changing the side the door opens prior to plugging it in and filling it up. This is a great addition to my bedroom!

reviews.title: Damaged Goods/Poor Packaging
reviews.review_text: Mini fridge picked up at Walmart for emergency need. At home, discovered it had no styrofoam side packing material as it said it would and the front of the fridge has a large dent in it. Must have been repackaged or sent from manufacturer without proper packaging.

reviews.title: Reliable Frig
reviews.review_text: We got this for our patio and it did not disappoint. Perfect for a small area. Very dependable and well made it stores just enough for our needs. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.review_text: Purchased for my Mom's room in memory care. Take it out of the box and plug it in- it cooled quickly. Perfect size for her yogurt, protein shakes, 7-up etc. The only recommendation would be a longer cord.

reviews.title: Mini fridge
reviews.review_text: Was still in packaging but when opened had a Huge dent all the way down the front! To much work and distance to try and return. Very disappointing it was for someone in the nursing home!

reviews.title: Don't Buy, Defective Product
reviews.review_text: This broke and lasted less than a year. It stopped being cold and started leaking. I took great care of it and rarely moved it around. This should have not been an issue. I would not suggest purchasing this item.

Good little refrigerator. We keep a thermometer in it, and it keeps things nice and cold, around 36-37 degrees. Freezer does not work well, but we really didn't want a freezer, anyway. It refrigerates things well.
I put it in my office and it has been amazing. Work Straight Out of the Box without malfunctioning. It has enough space for everything I need and stay super cold
What I disliked is that it came damaged there was a big dent on it and it makes a loud noise and it's specially annoying at night when you are trying to dleep

reviews.title: Power Mini Fridge
reviews.review_text: Love my little Fridge. Works well for the area I need. Holds temperature good. The little legs do adjust. Good for Water, drinks, small finger foods. Good purchase for me

reviews.title: Wirth it!
reviews.review_text: No real complaints just a minor click from time to time, and freezer doesn't actually keep items frozen (which is probably to be expected. *Great deal- I purchased it for a ‘back to school' discount

reviews.title: Perfect addition to my home office
reviews.review_text: It was cheaper than Amazon and I didn't have to pay shipping. I love how sleek the appearance is in my home office. As a disabled and retired military member, I don't have to go constantly up and down the stairs in my house when I am working.
The perfect size for what I needed it for. However, it sits low to the floor and the door drags against the floor when opening, only negative. Otherwise it serves the purpose.
I had a great experience ordering from Walmart. All I had to do was let them know I was on my way and what spot I was in and it was brought right out.

reviews.title: Great for camping!
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect small dorm fridge or even a refrigerator to take camping with you! The only drawback is the size of the freezer compartment, but it works well and didn't overwhelm my car battery to run it while we camped.

reviews.title: Great Quality and Competitively Priced
reviews.review_text: Just like any other mini fridge. very good price and pretty quiet. You will hear it if your room is completely quiet but if you have a fan on you can barely tell its on. keep my drink very cold and its not even on the coldest setting. very happy with the purchase

reviews.title: Temperature changes
reviews.review_text: I ordered this fridge a few months ago for pickup. Pickup was smooth and the fridge had no damages. It's small. I'd suggest housing it on a rack instead of the floor for easier access to your items inside. My only complaint is the freezer part and temperature in general is iffy. I have it set to max, but it barely feels cool on the inside consistently. The freezer part keeps the same temperature as the rest of the fridge. I put popsicles in to freeze and they are just chilled at best. I had two bags of frozen veggies go sour because of the iffy temperature change. Then a previous set of veggies got frost bite, again because of the temperature change. I honestly wouldn't rely on this fridge to store anything more than drinks.

reviews.title: exactky what i needed
reviews.review_text: Just whst i needed for my bedroom. the refrigerator keeps my drinks ice cold and has a freezer with an ice tray if you decide to use ice. i would recommend this for bedroom,rec room or anywhere cold itrmd need to be kept when not in the kitchen.
I was in need of a mini fridge to hold a few necessary items till my refrigerator can be serviced on 06/25. Thank you so much for delivering it on time and right to my kitchen door!!

I had a very hard time moving the door to the other side. It marked the top on the side it was already on, and it left white marks. Sucks. The cooling works great! But not as large inside as it appeared in the add.

reviews.title: Not happy.
reviews.review_text: I picked this up at the store for a school teacher and it was a different color, that's fine, but it has a dent all the way across the front. I was very upset. The teacher will send me one on Friday.

reviews.title: Great little fridge
reviews.review_text: Only add it a couple days it's working great. I have it on the colder setting and it actually even freezes things on the top. Not even in the compartment if I want it that cold. It looks sleek and well built. I love that it's an actual refrigerator in a small size that still holds Enough till you get to your bigger fridge

reviews.title: Great looking mini-fridge that keeps things cold!
reviews.review_text: Picked up a mini-fridge for my office and I'm pretty happy with it so far. I love that it has a 2-liter section, but I wish it was that tall all the way across the door. The finish is nice and so far the freezer has kept my ice frozen. I ordered for home delivery and it was on my front porch in about 2-hours. Great deal!

reviews.title: Quiet, Ice Cold, Great Value
reviews.review_text: I purchased this mini fridge in the store after stalking reviews online, so I didn't have to worry about dents from shipping. I'm very happy so far. It's quieter than I imagined, and it really keeps things ice cold. The shelves on the door use movable metal rods to keep drinks in place. It works well, but if you put a bottle of wine where the 2-liter soda bottle goes, there will be some movement/rattling when opening and closing the door. I really wish this came with a mini ice tray to save me another shopping trip, but other than that I'm enjoying my ice cold drinks from this whisper quiet compact fridge.

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.review_text: I've only had it about a day. But the build quality seems very competent for the $80 I paid. No idea how long it'll last, but it's quiet and gets colder than my full sized fridge. Also FYI don't stick these against a wall and cover them in clothes and other belongings. The compressor in the back gets hot and needs ventilation. Without ventilation it can cause the fridge to overheat or potentially catch fire.

reviews.title: Best mini fridge ever!!
reviews.review_text: This mini fridge was a Christmas gift for my teenage daughter. Previously I had purchased a really small fridge for $40 on Amazon. When I came across this at Walmart i immediately knew I would be returning the tiny one I had already bought. This was the best decision I could've made! My daughter loves her refrigerator and it works great!!! I will definitely be purchasing this exact one if we're ever in need of another mini fridge:

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.review_text: I originally owned one of those small $20 mini fridges that you could fit a handful of cans in. This one has so much more space. It fits my coffee creamer in it, cans, small bottles of sodas, yogurt (I keep my mini fridge in my room as it's also my office- I work from home).

reviews.title: My honest opinion
reviews.review_text: It's very nice. I like it a lot the only issues I have is that the freezer part does get very icy other then that it's amazing it fits so much in it I will be buying some storage containers to put into it for it's not as messy but can hold a lot of drinks/food. The front is magnet so I have some stuff hanging on it. It's pretty tall and wide. There was a new car smell to it but was not bad. I would 1000% but it again when I need another I will get this brand

reviews.title: Does its job, unlike my deadbeat son
reviews.review_text: Does exactly what I need it to. It's small enough to fit in my home office and large enough to hold some snacks and a few drinks. I will say the freezer compartment is too small to be of any real use and just sort of takes up space. Would be nice to just not have it.

reviews.title: It works well, but could use work with sound dapen
reviews.review_text: Not a bad unit and it does what it says it will do, keep things cold. Excellent for a garage or location away from typical areas of quiet occupation. But it is a bit loud. As in, full size refrigerator loud but it turns on to cool more often. Ultimately I relocated it to a different room in my house as my home office needs to be relatively quiet... and this wasn't it, even when on the other side of a wall from my office. I have also had small refrigerators before, so I know they CAN be more quiet... this one just isn't.

I was shopping for a 1.6 cubic foot refrigerator. Walmart had this Hiscense model which is a good brand to 'fit the bill' nicely. All-in, I was able to purchase the refrigerator with tax, including the optional 3-year warranty ($13.00) for just a bit over $****. So far, this item is performing beautifully.

This wasn't an impulsive, buy.It was in the educated by, my wife's fridge at work went out.And this was the best offer and the best quality that I could find. I wasn't willing to compromise.I shopped at home depot and costco, and this was the better buy.

reviews.title: Fridge works well. Freezer did not.
reviews.review_text: It did come a bit broken from the top. Also the freezer section in the fridge doesn't work well. Everything melts. And any stuff I place below the small freezer section gets frozen. So it's weird how it doesn't work when u want to put your ice cream inside but it freezes your cheese that's not inside. So I don't use the freezer anymore.

reviews.title: Freezer doesn't freeze that well
reviews.review_text: It refrigerates very well and I like how compact it is, but what's sad is that the freezer is 1. too small and 2. it doesn't freeze that well since water doesn't turn into ice. Ice stays as ice but water doesn't freeze and become ice even after 12 hours.

My momma icebox went out and had to be repaired on warranty. This quick same day delivery allowed her to put her medicine and some basic comforts in a reliable miniature refrigerator until the repairs were completed and her unit was returned. Thanks Walmart of Monroe Louisiana and the driver that carries the miniature unit into the house for her.

reviews.title: Affordable Mini Fridge
reviews.review_text: This Hisense fridge is an excellent addition to our sunroom. Perfect for all sorts of drinks and snacks. The price was good and the delivery was fast. We have had no issues with it. It would be perfect for a dorm for kids going to college in the fall.

Refrigerator damaged because of delivery she was on cell phone complaining the entire time, dropped on side and smashed flowers and plants i ordered. Very bad attitude plus not what I ordered at all did not even get close with replacements! What is wrong with your delivery people! This isn't the ghetto or 3rd ward and they better watch how they act! Taking my lunch from door dash and the other blaring her horn?!?' Are you kidding me?! You better re instruct your employees fast!!! I'm reporting into police and BBB

reviews.title: Mini Fridge Is A Good Value!
reviews.review_text: Refrigerator arrived the same day we ordered it! The outer cardboard packaging was pristine, and the fridge inside was perfectly new, with no dings or scratches. Once set up, we plugged it in and it started right up and has been running like a champ since then. Not much space in this one, but fine for our needs. The "mid" temperature setting is quite cold, so we turned it down a bit. It looks good in the room where it will be used. This unit is fine for a single person, or for snacks and drinks for a group. For the price, you can't beat this little fridge!

reviews.title: Great little Fridge!!
reviews.review_text: what i love about it was the size,plus it keeps it very cold. I have it in my bedroom . I was getting tired of going downstairs to get water or drinks all the time. so, i decided to buy a small fridge and having it in my room is awesome. love the size sits well on my table it does not make much noise which i like.

reviews.title: Quality Mini Fridge at a Great Price
reviews.review_text: This is a fabtastic mini fridge. I searched for months looking for a fridge where it's only function was cooling. Most of them had a warming feature as well and I did not want that since this was for my kids room. I got this Hisense for 89 bucks flat, and it is amazing. There is a ton of space, a removable glass shelf, and it gets extrememly cold. I have the dial set half way between low and mid, and it keeps all my kids snacks and drinks ice cold. The door is reversible, it's light enough for one adult to move around, and setup was as easy as removing the stickers and plugging it in. I let it run empty for just a few hours then it was good to stock with food and drinks. Its not terribly loud at all, and doesn't run for a long amount of time. This model has a freezer compartment but honestly I haven't tried it out yet. But please note, the user manual says for "temporary" storage of frozen items, so I assume they will not stay frozen for a long time. All in all, this is a fantastic mini fridge, and I'm extremely pleased with my purchase.
There are many dents on the outside of the fridge. Right front leg is missing. Inside looks and works as expected.

reviews.title: Good Refrigerator
reviews.review_text: I liked everything about the refrigerator except I found it impossible to switch the door opening to the other side.

reviews.title: Mini Fridge Unit
reviews.review_text: This unit does a fantastic job keeping drinks and foods cold. A bottle of Sunny D fell under the unit and it still froze. lol. Great value.
Martinsville Health and Rehab would not allow my brother to have this!! BUT, his roommate has one!!!!!
Good little refrigerator for the price. I wanted it for water and drinks and it keeps them at 40 degrees on midrange settung.
I had to returned it because it was too small. However, perfect size to have some cool drinks in your bedroom.
The mini frig works well. We use it outside to keep drimks cool. It has worked well even in this heat. Good purchase and good price.

reviews.title: Buy it!
reviews.review_text: Product is still new but so far so good! Fridge gets really cold and spacious enough for all of my Sons needs. Definitely recommend!
The little fridge is not top of the line, but the price was good, this I purchased it. It met my needs nicely.
refrigerator part is what you expect, minimal noise, but the freezer part no good for ice-cream ,most people dont for the freezer part

reviews.title: Definitely a great purchase
reviews.review_text: Fabulous mini fridge!! The inside is a great size and the cold crispness of a pop on a hot day is amazing
Order the mini refrigerator for my niece to go to college and she plugged it up and it done even work

reviews.title: Big Dent
reviews.review_text: My fridge came with a big dent on the side of the door. It cools great and works perfect but I was unable to contact anyone for a replacement.

reviews.title: College fridge
reviews.review_text: This product was really efficient for me as a college student. I move in to my dorm in mid August and is the best thing I can have.

reviews.title: Classroom sized fridge!
reviews.review_text: This little fridge is perfect for the office in my classroom! It has a little glass shelf and perfect sized freezer!
perfect use for brest milk in the room so that you don't have to go downstairs after pumping in the middle of the night

reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold, nice size too!
reviews.review_text: Nice size, not too small. Great for my work office. Keeps drinks really cold. I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.title: Great mini fridge
reviews.review_text: Perfect size for my mom who lives with us and doesn't want to constantly climb the stairs to get drinks from the kitchen. Looks sleek and not super big but holds a lot !

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.review_text: Fridge is very quiet and holds temperature really well. Purchased when my refrigerator died to keep my insulin cold. Worked like a charm. Very happy with this fridge
We opened the refrigerator box and looked, there was the entire front door of the refrigerator. It was all dented, there were dents all over the door.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: Works great! Had another brand that died on us after 2 months of use. Got this to replace for storing my dog's food. Works great and keeping cool as it should. Plenty of space for the money.

reviews.title: perfect size for where we needed
reviews.review_text: perfect size for my dads room downstairs. we tried the little 6 -12 can fridges and they didn't get cold enough for milk. this fits right under desk he doesn't use

reviews.title: Must do better...
reviews.review_text: Bought this item to be delivered. Received it fast but fridge has huge dents on both of the sides. Fridge looks brand new (minus the dents). The box it came in was not damaged at all, so someone boxed it up with those huge dents. Really wanted to be excited with my purchase but now I'm left feeling awful.

reviews.title: would recommend
reviews.review_text: My husband was using it in his 18-wheeler. He liked it. it got the job done. it was a good investment my husband said.
The best, actually, was Walmart's curbside service. I pulled up, called, and they brought the Refrigerator out and loaded in a minute !

reviews.title: Good dorm fridge
reviews.review_text: Perfect for my daughters dorm room. Great deal too. She loves that it has a little freezer area for ice or ice cream

reviews.title: emergency fridge.
reviews.review_text: Needed because main refrigerator failed and would be replaced for some time. This little fridge would have to fill in the gap .

reviews.title: Shipping damage??
reviews.review_text: Dent down front door, and staple holes in side- not thrilled with the condition considering it's supposed to be new??
The mini fridge would have been perfect if it wasn't dented when I received it so I had to take it back.

reviews.title: Small defects when arrived
reviews.review_text: Upon opening the box the freezer was in, there was a large dent on the bottom left side of the door.

reviews.title: just right
reviews.review_text: enough space for what i was looking for, and doesn't take up a ton of counter space. nice solution for a temporary or extra fridge.

Got this to store pumped milk for my newborn %26 to not have to go down to the kitchen in the middle of the night. Worked okay for 3 months, but now makes a clicking sound when it kicks on, which then wakes us up. Other than that, it works fine.
The refrigerator is rather loud when it starts the cooling cycle. I had to return it because it wouldn't get cold enough to keep already cold food, cold.

reviews.title: A bit noisy
reviews.review_text: I like this fridge and it’s a good size but the noise is a bit annoying. At night, it makes noise on and off and I just got this yesterday so I’m not sure if the fridge is defective or if it’s suppose to be making noise

reviews.title: Great for space, not for storms
reviews.review_text: The I really like this fridge, the only issue I have with it is the buildup of ice in the freezer area. It creates a puddle on the floor when you unplug the fridge. Would not recommend if you frequently experience power outages

perfect for a kids room or even a dotm room doesn't take up alot of space and can hold slit of things is light weight easy to get upstairs and keeps uour food at the right temperature the freezer works great

reviews.title: Item damaged
reviews.review_text: The fridge was received very damaged on one side, but it is cooling. So I hid the damage against a wall because I don't want to go through the trouble of boxing it up and returning it to buy another one.

reviews.title: Its a mini fridge simple
reviews.review_text: Its a basic mini fridge. i just wanted something to keep sodas cold in our game room at home. perfect for what we needed it for. No fancy bells and whistles its just a mini fridge. If your an Air Force vet there basically what we had on base.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: Keeps my drinks nice and cold and is a good size. I store leftover meals in there. They will freeze if you have it on the lowest temp! The little freezer parts works well. Enough room for a couple small drinks.

reviews.title: 𝙈𝙞𝙣𝙞 𝙁𝙧𝙞𝙙𝙜𝙚

reviews.title: Happy with Hisense
reviews.review_text: I love the simplistic styling of this mini fridge. it's quiet, sleek, and it is working perfectly for my needs. i also appreciate the affordability and I trust the Hisense brand. Nothing negative to review, it was a sound purchase.

The Fridge was smaller than expected, and it had Dents on the front Door. But we needed a Fridge and was not able to take back to the Store. Because it was delivered.So we ended up keeping the Fridge , Dents snd All.

reviews.title: Great size
reviews.review_text: Purchased this for my college daughter who absolutely loves it. Perfect size, holds half a gallon milk and a few bottles of water in the door, along with a larger capacity to hold other things.

reviews.title: It's ok.
reviews.review_text: A little smaller than I thought it would be . The quality seems good though. Had to take out the shelf to fit a gallon of Arnold Palmer half and half in. Bought it for elderly mother's room. It works for what she needed. Barely.

reviews.title: Great for bedrooms!
reviews.review_text: Fantastic drink fridge! Only issues would be the temperature gauge being on the inside, since items in the fridge can hit the gauge, or it can be difficult to reach when it's full. Everything else works perfectly! The convenience of putting leftovers in it instead of walking to the kitchen is unparalleled, and at 3 AM ice cold water hits different.

reviews.title: Would buy again
reviews.review_text: I am using this for my garage. It holds about 12 small bottles of water in the inside and a few more in the side door. We have ice pops in the freezer and they stay frozen. I like that you can switch the door to whatever way you want it to open. It has a 3 prong plug so plan accordingly.

Perfect size for my classroom. We can save extra milk and juice for the students. It has a little freezer compartment that is perfect for mini ice creams, a few freezer packs, or a couple of frozen dinners. The refrigerator is quiet. I cannot hear it at all. I highly recommend this mini-fridge for anyone who needs a small fridge in a small place.

reviews.title: Damaged Door- BE FORWARNED!
reviews.review_text: The little fridge itself is good, very quiet, cooled quickly, and a perfect size for my office. The delivery from Walmart was fine, it was a cute older couple that very carefully unloaded the 30 lb mini fridge to my front door. My issue is that it came damaged, with an 8-inch vertical dent in the middle of the front door. That occurred during transport from the manufacturer to Walmart. They need to do a much better job packaging the item, the heavy card box is NOT enough. They should add a piece of Styrofoam to the front and back to shield it. Over and over, I see many other reviewers experiencing the same damage. Honestly, it's too much of a hassle to return it to the store because the fridge works well. Hisense NEEDS to do MUCH BETTER on packaging their product or it would have received 5 stars.

It's small but not too small. It holds my lunch container about 4 waters laying down, and small sport drinks and a bunch of box juices for my kids when they come to see me at work. Plus it holds only my lunch so Barbara can't put her paws on it saying she thought was hers!

Unit was delivered due to its size and I had no way of physically transporting on my own , i unboxed when it arrived and it had a huge dent on its side ! I called and explained that there was no way for me to physically return , both Hisense and Walmart customer service refused to consider or provide other options so I was forced to keep the damaged product

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.review_text: It is what I expected. More than that. It was cool in minutes and I didn't expect that. Silent and energy efficient, so silent that I was wandering if it is working. It has enough capacity for food or anything else that one may need to keep cool. It even has small cooling department. There are door shelves where one can place milk or water bottles. And outside look is cool and can be placed everywhere. Strongly recommend.

reviews.title: So quiet
reviews.review_text: This mini fridge was exactly what I was looking for my home office or for a bedroom. It is super quiet and keeps my bottled water so cold. Perfect for beverages, White Claws stand up and I can lay my water bottles on their side and stack them too. You can open the door from the right or left side. The size is perfect and it's pretty easy to move if needed. Walmart had it at a wonderful sale price so I took a chance and I'm glad I did. Definitely recommend this mini fridge.

reviews.title: The Fridge is Fridging
reviews.review_text: You definitely get the bang for your buck. Priced just right and it works great.

reviews.title: Too Small

Fridge is great for the price. It's cold, quiet, and does the trick!

working great I work in a shop and it still keeping everything very cold

reviews.title: Great little fridge!
reviews.review_text: I really like it. It is small and fits perfectly under my desk. I also like that it is pretty light. I expected it to be heavy and hard to manage but it isn't. It fits a fair amount of drinks and things in it too. Overall I am extremely satisfied with this product.

reviews.title: Do not recommend!
reviews.review_text: Purchased on 5/22. It’s now 8/14 and 2 weeks ago it just went off and defrosted itself. I turned it off, checked the plug… it came back on but it keeps going out! Cannot put perishable items in it. It has went out again twice today. It’s frustrating! I’m still within my return period and Walmart online cs stated they can’t take it back at the store location without the box and offered me a 25% partial refund. Well ok, I’m still out 75% of my money for a non functioning product. I’ve contacted Hisense bc they have a 1 year warranty and have heard nothing back from them. Absolutely would not recommend this fridge. I should have paid more and gotten a better brand. If you still decide to go with this brand, I would definitely pay extra and get the extended warranty. Disappointing!
Fit where I need it and cooled off quickly. I need it for diabetics supplies and for when I have my knee replacement
The fridge works well but the freezer not so much . It also froze my milk I don't kno why it was in the fridge
Makes my food taste chemically, it would definitely be worth it to buy one that's just $50 more expensive and get a better fridge.

reviews.title: A typical Walmart product, defective at the time.
reviews.review_text: I need a mini fridge for a month so I picked one that was on the low end. The features it offers reflect that but I'm not looking for much and don't mind the thin sheet metal construction. As far as ease of installation, you plug it in. One nice thing is there's not lots of little bits of tape here and there, hidden away. One thing it offers that most products don't offer is it's damaged. It's not done during shipment the dings are small and we're done prior to packaging at manufacture and there's no way they were missed.

reviews.title: AMAZING mini fridge
reviews.review_text: This mini fridge has met all my needs. It definitely keeps my snacks and drinks cold, and it’s the perfect size for a bedroom or a dorm room. The 2 - liter bottle storage is also conveniet and the sleek design is nice and matches with my room overall. I will be buying one for my sister!

As I previously stated, my large old refrigerator ceased to operate and I had items that had to be refrigerated. I didn't know what to do. None of the stores were open yet had a refrigerator is a big purchase. I ordered a small college style refrigerator and I was amazed that Walmart delivered it within an hour or so. They saved the medication %26 my Cool Whip among other things. I'm still using the little refrigerator while awaiting the delivery of the big new refrigerator. Thank you Walmart for exemplary service.

reviews.title: Hisense 1.6Cu is an amazing fridge!
reviews.review_text: This fridge was a lifesaver for me! I was looking for a compact, roomy, durable and affordable fridge all at once and this Hisense 1.6Cu fridge with freezer compartment checked all my boxes! Don’t let the price fool you! It is well made sturdy and you cannot beat the performance! It cools very quickly and the freezer compartment freezes quickly as well! All I can say is don’t hesitate to buy it at all! 10/10 for the quality and price!

reviews.title: Small fridge, big efficiency

This is exactly what we needed and we were so thrilled and derived that same day to use for our baby immediately bottles

reviews.title: Cubicle Fridge
reviews.review_text: Great quality, only one complaint…things freeze and I cannot find a thermostat. Otherwise, it's perfect.

reviews.title: Perfect for office
reviews.review_text: Just the right size for my office it's perfect for the small space to keep lunch and snack safe I love it

reviews.title: Quit working after a week.
reviews.review_text: This fridge has all the standard features. I ended up returning this after it quit cooling a week and a half after purchasing.
The reason i rated this 4 stars is because there was a big dent on the back of the fridge,but other than that works perfectly.
I bought this for my husbands game room. He uses it as a table between the chairs and it's fully stocked. Good size, works great. No complaints.
Great little fridge. Holds more than you think it could. Items freeze directly underneath the freezer compartment, so just be prepared.
Shipped super fast. Easy to unpack and plug in. User friendly. Freezer is great for ice packs, but not much else. Excellnt value.
This fridge is the perfect size and keeps drinks pretty cold. I was surprised how cold this fridge got.

reviews.title: Defective product
reviews.review_text: Refrigerator keeps shutting off. I have opened it up 3 times and found it wet inside and not running. Had to turn switch off and back on again to restart it.
Don't even bother buying it. After six month's the mini fridge broke down and the manufacture doesn't want to be responsible to replace it or give me a refund

reviews.title: Great mini fridge for the office.
reviews.review_text: This is a great product to just put in the corner of the office area. Does not take up a lot of space and can place things on top of the fridge as well. It keeps drinks cold and relatively quiet.

reviews.title: Not reliable
reviews.review_text: This mini fridge stoped working totally after about a month maybe 5 weeks. Walmart would not do a return because I didn't have the original box that it came in. I am having to research to find out manufacturers warranty information

reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 DAYS
reviews.review_text: Purchased to use in my office and it worked 5 days and stopped! I had read all the bad reviews, but was hoping I'd get a good one. They need to stop production on these and find out what the problem is if they don't already know.

reviews.title: Great little Mini fridge.
reviews.review_text: Perfect little refrigerator with compact freezer just enough to put those delicious ice cream sandwiches in. Runs great, super quiet. I would purchase another one.

reviews.title: A waste of money
reviews.review_text: Got this for my son for Christmas, and here it is February 1st and it already stopped working. The inside is warm, with water everywhere from the freezer! Do not buy!!!

reviews.title: Great Mini Fridge.
reviews.review_text: This fridge keeps drinks and food really cold. it runs very quiet. I like that it has adjustable temperature. I like that it is compact and small enough to put in my bedroom. If you want to put in a room that has carpeting. I would recommend getting a base for it. The base are pretty inexpensive and you can get them off a amazon. That way the carpeting won't get damaged especially, if you live in a apartment. I unfortunately scratched it. So,I would suggest be careful with it because it does scratch easily. Besides, it is a very quiet and wonderful mini fridge. I would definitely recommend purchasing it.

reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
reviews.review_text: I needed a mini fridge immediately and this was perfect. I ordered it for delivery and it arrived within an hour. It keeps everything perfectly cold as well as keeping ice frozen in the little freezer. Surprisingly it was so light to carry. The entire experience was a blessing and I love this fridge so much. Would definitely recommend

Would like to share negative experience had with your customer service desk employee...very rude asked where was online pickup said abruptly customer service is closed it was about 9:45pm and was not aware that pick up closed at 10pm so was trying to get there quickly as when checked hours online store closure time was 11pm. But found out in enough time that pick up closed at 10pm. He was of no assistance to help direct me to pick up area. Very rude and argumentative.
